nvpair.name: iptables_stop_rules
nvpair.value: iptables -t mangle -D PREROUTING -i br-ex-hapr -j MARK --set-mark 0x2a ; iptables -t nat -D POSTROUTING -m mark --mark 0x2a ! -o br-ex -j MASQUERADE

nvpair.name: iptables_start_rules
nvpair.value: iptables -t mangle -I PREROUTING -i br-ex-hapr -j MARK --set-mark 0x2a ; iptables -t nat -I POSTROUTING -m mark --mark 0x2a ! -o br-ex -j MASQUERADE

nvpair.name: iptables_stop_rules
nvpair.value: iptables -t mangle -D PREROUTING -i br-mgmt-hapr -j MARK --set-mark 0x2b ; iptables -t nat -D POSTROUTING -m mark --mark 0x2b ! -o br-mgmt -j MASQUERADE

nvpair.name: iptables_start_rules
nvpair.value: iptables -t mangle -I PREROUTING -i br-mgmt-hapr -j MARK --set-mark 0x2b ; iptables -t nat -I POSTROUTING -m mark --mark 0x2b ! -o br-mgmt -j MASQUERADE
